column4: Maybe try http://repogen.simplylinux.ch/ but I would suggest not selecting any third party ones for now at least.
i'm pretty scared what will happen to this sys on apt-get update; not even knowing if its deb or ub. i dont know how it got this way. i'm hoping i can look at packages folder and sort it out
i think i musta converted it to ub from deb,at some point
it's Ubuntu, my /etc/debian_version also has debian release names there.
